val: You can select a value from the range <-15, 15>.
rear-flap: In this graph, it is possible to monitor the inclination of the rear flap as a function of time.
plane-sim: On this page it is possible to simulate the inclination of the aircraft using the angle r chosen by you.The value that is entered in the field is in radians. The range of the entered value is from -1.6 rads to 1.6 rads and after conversion to degrees it is + -90 degrees. In the animation, it is possible to observe the deviation of the aircraft from its flight axis based on the entered value.
getStart-text: Use of our API services requires the user account. To create a new account, you need to sign up or you can log in using a Google account or ldap. API key will be generated for you, as soon as your account is created. This API key is available for you in settings section and you can reset it any time.
sims-text: Octave data are responsed in JSON file format. You need to add your API key to obtain them. The correct form of API calls are listed on this page.
s1-text: It's necessary to add the height of the obstacle r in the car suspension system simulator. API call:
s2-text: It's necessary to add the position of the pendulum r in the inverted pendulum simulator. API call:
s3-text: It's necessary to add the position of the ball r in the beam and ball simulator. API call:
s4-text: It's necessary to add the pitch of the aircraft r in the aircraft pitch control simulator. API call:

ldap_ref: LDAP bind failef please check your internet connection/credentials.
login_exists: Login already exists,please choose different one.
h1-idx: We offer you modern solutions, in the world of Computer aided systems.
h2-idx: Our personal goal is to make this world a better place

resetpasswd-send-fail: Could not send reset link. Check your email or try again later.
